data.eml:eml: Moema apurinan sp. n. and Aphyolebias boticarioi sp. n. (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae): two new annual killifishes from the Rio Purus basin, Brazilian Amazon.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilson J. E. M. Costa (2004): Moema apurinan sp. n. and Aphyolebias boticarioi sp. n. (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae): two new annual killifishes from the Rio Purus basin, Brazilian Amazon. Zootaxa 707: 1-12, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:9D4BF84D-0FDC-4C56-B4C7-C3B237E2C038
